a.detail: An iron chandelier hangs from the ceiling here

c.detail: A large demonic idol with ruby eyes sits in an alcove here

e.detail:
Guillotine Blade: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +8 to hit against one target, 2d10 slashing damage

m.detail:
Poison Gas Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 13 save or take 2d10 poison damage

n.detail:
Concealed Pit: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets entering a 10 ft. square area, DC 19 save or take 4d10 damage

details.history: The dungeon was created by mind flayers as a lair. Its creators were destroyed by a terrible discovery, and the dungeon has lain empty for many years until recently.

detail.room_features: A faded and torn tapestry hangs from the north wall, and someone has scrawled "Beneath the statue" in dwarvish runes on the north wall

wandering_monsters.1: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.2: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.3: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316); deadly, 450 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.4: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.5: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.6: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
